After<S>3326</S> these things<S>5023</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> shewed<S>5319</S> himself<S>1438</S> again<S>3825</S> to the disciples<S>3101</S> at<S>1909</S> the sea<S>2281</S> of Tiberias<S>5085</S>; and<S>1161</S> on this wise<S>3779</S> shewed<S>5319</S> he himself.
There were<S>2258</S> together<S>3674</S> Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S>, and<S>2532</S> Thomas<S>2381</S> called<S>3004</S> Didymus<S>1324</S>, and<S>2532</S> Nathanael<S>3482</S> of<S>575</S> Cana<S>2580</S> in Galilee<S>1056</S>, and<S>2532</S> the sons <S>3588</S> of Zebedee<S>2199</S>, and<S>2532</S> two<S>1417</S> other<S>243</S> of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>.
Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, I go<S>5217</S> a fishing<S>232</S>. They say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, We<S>2249</S> also<S>2532</S> go<S>2064</S> with<S>4862</S> thee<S>4671</S>. They went forth<S>1831</S>, and<S>2532</S> entered<S>305</S> into<S>1519</S> a ship<S>4143</S> immediately<S>2117</S>; and<S>2532</S> that<S>1722</S> <S>1565</S> night<S>3571</S> they caught<S>4084</S> nothing<S>3762</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when the morning<S>4405</S> was<S>1096</S> now<S>2235</S> come<S>1096</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> stood<S>2476</S> on<S>1519</S> the shore<S>123</S>: but<S>3305</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> knew<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>3754</S> it was<S>2076</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Children<S>3813</S>, have ye<S>2192</S> any<S>3387</S> meat<S>4371</S>? They answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, No<S>3756</S>.Children: or, Sirs
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Cast<S>906</S> the net<S>1350</S> on<S>1519</S> the right<S>1188</S> side<S>3313</S> of the ship<S>4143</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye shall find<S>2147</S>. They cast<S>906</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, and<S>2532</S> now<S>3765</S> they were<S>2480</S> not<S>3765</S> able<S>2480</S> to draw<S>1670</S> it<S>846</S> for<S>575</S> the multitude<S>4128</S> of fishes<S>2486</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> that<S>1565</S> disciple<S>3101</S> whom<S>3739</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> loved<S>25</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto Peter<S>4074</S>, It is<S>2076</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>. Now<S>3767</S> when Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> it was<S>2076</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, he girt<S>1241</S> his fisher's coat<S>1903</S> unto him, (for<S>1063</S> he was<S>2258</S> naked<S>1131</S>,) and<S>2532</S> did cast<S>906</S> himself<S>1438</S> into<S>1519</S> the sea<S>2281</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the other<S>243</S> disciples<S>3101</S> came<S>2064</S> in a little ship<S>4142</S>; (for<S>1063</S> they were<S>2258</S> not<S>3756</S> far<S>3112</S> from<S>575</S> land<S>1093</S>, but<S>235</S> as it were<S>5613</S> <S>575</S> two hundred<S>1250</S> cubits<S>4083</S>,) dragging<S>4951</S> the net<S>1350</S> with fishes<S>2486</S>.
As soon<S>5613</S> then<S>3767</S> as they were come<S>576</S> to<S>1519</S> land<S>1093</S>, they saw<S>991</S> a fire of coals<S>439</S> there, and<S>2532</S> fish<S>3795</S> laid<S>2749</S> thereon<S>1945</S>, and<S>2532</S> bread<S>740</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Bring<S>5342</S> of<S>575</S> the fish<S>3795</S> which<S>3739</S> ye have<S>4084</S> now<S>3568</S> caught<S>4084</S>.
Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> went up<S>305</S>, and<S>2532</S> drew<S>1670</S> the net<S>1350</S> to<S>1909</S> land<S>1093</S> full<S>3324</S> of great<S>3173</S> fishes<S>2486</S>, an hundred<S>1540</S> and fifty<S>4004</S> and three<S>5140</S>: and<S>2532</S> for all there were so many<S>5118</S>, yet was<S>5607</S> not<S>3756</S> the net<S>1350</S> broken<S>4977</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Come<S>1205</S> and dine<S>709</S>. And<S>1161</S> none<S>3762</S> of the disciples<S>3101</S> durst<S>5111</S> ask<S>1833</S> him<S>846</S>, Who<S>5101</S> art<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S>? knowing<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> it was<S>2076</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> then<S>3767</S> cometh<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> taketh<S>2983</S> bread<S>740</S>, and<S>2532</S> giveth<S>1325</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> fish<S>3795</S> likewise<S>3668</S>.
This<S>5124</S> is<S>5319</S> now<S>2235</S> the third time<S>5154</S> that Jesus<S>2424</S> shewed himself<S>5319</S> to his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, after that he was risen<S>1453</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>.
So<S>3767</S> when<S>3753</S> they had dined<S>709</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> to Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S>, Simon<S>4613</S>, son of Jonas<S>2495</S>, lovest thou<S>25</S> me<S>3165</S> more than<S>4119</S> these<S>5130</S>? He saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Yea<S>3483</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>; thou<S>4771</S> knowest<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> I love<S>5368</S> thee<S>4571</S>. He saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Feed<S>1006</S> my<S>3450</S> lambs<S>721</S>.
He saith<S>3004</S> to him<S>846</S> again<S>3825</S> the second time<S>1208</S>, Simon<S>4613</S>, son of Jonas<S>2495</S>, lovest thou<S>25</S> me<S>3165</S>? He saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Yea<S>3483</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>; thou<S>4771</S> knowest<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> I love<S>5368</S> thee<S>4571</S>. He saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Feed<S>4165</S> my<S>3450</S> sheep<S>4263</S>.
He saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S> the third<S>5154</S> time, Simon<S>4613</S>, son of Jonas<S>2495</S>, lovest<S>5368</S> thou me<S>3165</S>? Peter<S>4074</S> was grieved<S>3076</S> because<S>3754</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S> the third<S>5154</S> time, Lovest<S>5368</S> thou me<S>3165</S>? And<S>2532</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, thou<S>4771</S> knowest<S>1492</S> all things<S>3956</S>; thou<S>4771</S> knowest<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> I love<S>5368</S> thee<S>4571</S>. Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Feed<S>1006</S> my<S>3450</S> sheep<S>4263</S>.
Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, When<S>3753</S> thou wast<S>2258</S> young<S>3501</S>, thou girdedst<S>2224</S> thyself<S>4572</S>, and<S>2532</S> walkedst<S>4043</S> whither<S>3699</S> thou wouldest<S>2309</S>: but<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> thou shalt be old<S>1095</S>, thou shalt stretch forth<S>1614</S> thy<S>4675</S> hands<S>5495</S>, and<S>2532</S> another<S>243</S> shall gird<S>2224</S> thee<S>4571</S>, and<S>2532</S> carry<S>5342</S> thee whither<S>3699</S> thou wouldest<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S>.
<S>1161</S> This<S>5124</S> spake he<S>2036</S>, signifying<S>4591</S> by what<S>4169</S> death<S>2288</S> he should glorify<S>1392</S> God<S>2316</S>. And<S>2532</S> when he had spoken<S>2036</S> this<S>5124</S>, he saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Follow<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S>, turning about<S>1994</S>, seeth<S>991</S> the disciple<S>3101</S> whom<S>3739</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> loved<S>25</S> following<S>190</S>; which<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> leaned<S>377</S> on<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> breast<S>4738</S> at<S>1722</S> supper<S>1173</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, which<S>5101</S> is he<S>2076</S> that betrayeth<S>3860</S> thee<S>4571</S>?
Peter<S>4074</S> seeing<S>1492</S> him<S>5126</S> saith<S>3004</S> to Jesus<S>2424</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, and<S>1161</S> what<S>5101</S> shall this man<S>3778</S> do?
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, If<S>1437</S> I will<S>2309</S> that he<S>846</S> tarry<S>3306</S> till<S>2193</S> I come<S>2064</S>, what<S>5101</S> is that to<S>4314</S> thee<S>4571</S>? follow<S>190</S> thou<S>4771</S> me<S>3427</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> went<S>1831</S> this<S>3778</S> saying<S>3056</S> abroad<S>1831</S> among<S>1519</S> the brethren<S>80</S>, that<S>3754</S> that<S>1565</S> disciple<S>3101</S> should<S>599</S> not<S>3756</S> die<S>599</S>: yet<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> not<S>3756</S> unto him<S>846</S>,<S>3754</S> He shall<S>599</S> not<S>3756</S> die<S>599</S>; but<S>235</S>, If<S>1437</S> I will<S>2309</S> that he<S>846</S> tarry<S>3306</S> till<S>2193</S> I come<S>2064</S>, what<S>5101</S> is that to<S>4314</S> thee<S>4571</S>?
This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the disciple<S>3101</S> which<S>3588</S> testifieth<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> these things<S>5130</S>, and<S>2532</S> wrote<S>1125</S> these things<S>5023</S>: and<S>2532</S> we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> his<S>846</S> testimony<S>3141</S> is<S>2076</S> true<S>227</S>.
And<S>1161</S> there are<S>2076</S> also<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> other things<S>243</S> which<S>3745</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> did<S>4160</S>, the which<S>3748</S>, if<S>1437</S> they should be written<S>1125</S> every<S>2596</S> one<S>1520</S>, I suppose<S>3633</S> that even<S>3761</S> the world<S>2889</S> itself<S>846</S> could not<S>3761</S> contain<S>5562</S> the books<S>975</S> that should be written<S>1125</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
